snippet: The Killers, the Black Keys and Jack White will headline the Firefly Music Festival, which will be held at the Woodlands of Dover International Speedway in Delaware in July.
abstract: The Killers, the Black Keys and Jack White will headline the Firefly Music Festival, which will be held at the Woodlands of Dover International Speedway in Delaware in July.

headline.main: A New Pop Music Festival in Delaware
headline.print_headline: New Pop Music Festival In Delaware This Summer
